item.title: Breaking Into Data Science I: Plan of Attack
item.description: In 5th grade, one of my classmates fell down and broke his arm during a game of two-hand touch football, so the elementary school banned the sport during recess. I was pretty upset about this. Lots of kids were. This was Texas, after all, and we loved our football. I experimented with other recess activities: hopscotch, double Dutch, chalk drawing, tetherball, basketball, dodgeball, kickball. Many of these activities just didn’t do it for me.
